page.title: 11EDUCATION DONAGHADEE
page.content:
There are 4 schools in the 4km by 3km block, 3 Primary and one Secondary. { {Donaghadee Primary}has about 350 pupils drawn mostly from the town. { {Ballyvester Primary}is a smaller school serving the rural community. { {St. Anne's Primary}is a small voluntary school providing an alternative education for Catholic pupils. { {Donaghadee High School}provides secondary education for about 350 pupils from a wide catchment area.
There is no Nursery School. Grammar School education is only available in two nearby towns.
